message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $180. I believe it's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the product's value, but I'm only willing to pay up to $150 for it. Looking forward to your response.
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $165?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget, I can go up to $160 for the product. Let me know if this works for you.
